author: kevaundray
content:
Yeah exactly, though for mandatory proofs, the thinking is that these zk attesters will also be FOCIL includers -- For includers, a mempool would be required to accept transactions. This would mean that getBlobsVx would be usable.

Noting that for a stateless node to have a functioning mempool, they need to be able to check whether a transaction is valid via a mechanism like VOPs

author: soispoke
content: for regular txns, yes I think the easier solution is to have partially stateless nodes that keep just enough state to determine whether txns are valid or not (VOPS)
